info.name: daylight__polling_01
info.description:
Similar to Daylight Simple series but here we OVERRIDE the fixtures to specific levels, test that value and then wait more than the daylight period and check back to see if the light was asjusted down.
NOTE:  DAYLIGHT POLLING is ONLY valid during the hours of 8am and 5pm because the daylight polling engine will time check and only adjust daylight during those hours

exec: tests["Status code is 200"] = responseCode.code === 200;

var t = new Date().getTime();
while (new Date().getTime() < t + 1500);
